description.raw:
Address issue #145

* Concatenated files:

    * gz3d.js =  (src - gui) + dependencies
    * gz3d.gui.js = src + dependencies
    * gz3d.src.js = src

* Minified versions are created for each of them
* No longer keep track of `gz3d/build/gz3d.js`. Instead, make sure it is generated during deploy by calling `grunt build`
* Use `gz3d.js` in the embedded example 
* Use `gz3d.gui.js` in the main `index.html`
* Use `gz3d.src.js` during tests. This is necessary because we need to control the order of dependency inclusions.

  • Minified versions are created for each of them

  • No longer keep track of gz3d/build/gz3d.js. Instead, make sure it is generated during deploy by calling grunt build
  • Use gz3d.js in the embedded example
  • Use gz3d.gui.js in the main index.html
  • Use gz3d.src.js during tests. This is necessary because we need to control the order of dependency inclusions.

title: Naming scheme for concatenated files
